Gitlab improvements

04 October 2012

We've been hard at work to improve Gitlab, here are some of the items we've worked on:
  • Our method for properly validating ssh keys was recently merged into Gitlab
  • The fingerprint of our git server will stay the same, the server host key should be: ECDSA f1:d0:fb:46:73:7a:70:92:5a:ab:5d:ef:43:e2:1c:35
  • Gitlab.com was upgraded to the latest Gitlab version
  • Helped track down a bug in ssh key deletion
  • Fixed a mass assignment vulnerability
